Modifications.Value: If Maiev would die, she instead regains some health and becomes an Avatar of Vengeance for 20 seconds. If Maiev attacks 5 times in this form, she revives instantly. Otherwise, she dies. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Restores 1200 health and increases attack damage by 40.|n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Restores 1500 health and increases attack damage by 60. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Restores 1800 health and increases attack damage by 80.

If Maiev would die, she instead regains 1200 health and becomes an Avatar of Vengeance for 20 seconds, increasing her attack damage by 40. If Maiev attacks 9 times in this form, she revives instantly. Otherwise, she dies.

If Maiev would die, she instead regains 1500 health and becomes an Avatar of Vengeance for 20 seconds, increasing her attack damage by 60. If Maiev attacks 9 times in this form, she revives instantly. Otherwise, she dies.

If Maiev would die, she instead regains 1800 health and becomes an Avatar of Vengeance for 20 seconds, increasing her attack damage by 80. If Maiev attacks 9 times in this form, she revives instantly. Otherwise, she dies.
